mapper.select: SELECT ticket_idx, t_userid, t_age, t_title, t_theater, t_start_time, t_people, t_seat, t_price, t_serial_num, screen_idx, m.age m_age FROM MEMBER m, stats s WHERE s.t_userid= m.userid and t_userid= 'guest'

SELECT ticket_idx, t_userid, t_age, t_title, t_theater, t_start_time, t_people, t_seat, t_price, t_serial_num, screen_idx, m.age m_age FROM MEMBER m, stats s WHERE s.t_userid= m.userid and t_userid!= 'guest'
